FROM dcloud/ssh-base:0.2

RUN mkdir -p /etc/dcloud/dnsmasq

RUN yum -y install dnsmasq && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN sed -i 's/OPTIONS=.*/OPTIONS=\"-s $DOMAIN_SUFFIX --addn-hosts \/etc\/dcloud\/dnsmasq\/hosts\"/' /etc/init.d/dnsmasq
